attributes.action: To have more bank holidays, at least 4 more. Spread over the year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have amongst the lowest number of bank holidays in Europe, as well as having some of the longest working hours. It's not good. Want more Bank holidays

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To have more bank holidays, at least 4 more. Spread over the year."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11549.asp
